answers.author: Cory Fleming
answers.text:
Hi Kim,
ICMA has a wealth of resources available through its National Study of 311 and Customer Service Technology (www.icma.org/311).  Through the study, we have collected a number of RFPs from jurisdictions seeking 311/CRM technology as well as consulting services (http://icma.org/en/results/sustainable_communities/project_focus_areas/current_projects/311/topic. )   Let me know if there's any additional information we can provide.
Cory

Cory

author: Kim Probasco
text: I’m looking for some examples of RFPs, consultant solicitations, or contracts utilizing a consultant to investigate an entity's customer contacts and how best/most efficiently to handle them, whether through a 311 option or otherwise.
title: Customer Contacts
